# Law Firm Website Project

This is a modern, professional law firm website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Project Structure
- HTML pages for all main sections
- Responsive CSS with grey, red, and blue color palette  
- Interactive JavaScript for navigation and forms
- Practice area sub-pages
- Contact forms and case results display

## Design Features
- Sticky navigation with dropdowns
- Hero section with call-to-action
- Practice areas cards
- Case results grid
- Contact forms
- Responsive design for all devices

## Color Palette
- Primary: Grey for backgrounds
- Accent 1: Red for CTAs and highlights  
- Accent 2: Blue for trust and professionalism
